name: Peekapak
description:
Peekapak is an award-winning, social & emotional learning (SEL) program designed for the classroom and the home. Developed by education experts, Peekapak's innovative curriculum combines teaching skills like gratitude, empathy and self-regulation with Common Core reading and writing standards. Peekapak aims to make SEL learning resources more accessible with its freemium website. Teachers can sign up for free at www.peekapak.com. 

• Featured on Flare, Huffington Post, EdSurge, Edutopia, Entrepreneur Magazine, BetaKit, TechVibes, Yahoo Finance, International Business Times, CBC TV & Radio, Metro News, Adweek, CTV, Toronto Star and CH Morning Live
• Backed by Imagine K12 (the Edtech vertical of YCombinator) & JOLT (MaRS) Accelerator programs with investment and is an Unreasonable Institute Fellow
• Research partnerships with Denver Public Schools, Elizabeth Public Schools and Mile High Early Learning and 3 research projects with George Brown College's Early Childhood Department from the Canadian Government (NSERC) and the Ontario Centres for Excellence (OCE) 
• Academics'​ Choice Award Winner
• Winners of the MasterCard Women in Entrepreneurship program
• Recipient of the Centre For Social Innovation's Ontario Catapult Microloan, SheEO program and Grand Prize Winner of the It's a Start Competition

“Peekapak helps take the stress out of teaching SEL.” Learn more about Peekapak's Impact
![Nelson Education](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/logo-nelson-rectangle-CSUMfeEJ.svg)
Helping Students Thrive with Engaging Learning & Well-Being Insights
A research-backed platform blending immersive storytelling, interactive activities, and real-time data to support mental health, social-emotional growth, and academic success—all while aligning with educational standards.
Elementary (PreK-Gr. 5)
Features levelled readers and fully-planned learning activities to help students develop SEL while also building reading and writing skills.
Learn MoreCreated with Sketch.
Secondary (Gr. 6-12)
Peekapak’s ready-to-teach units, lessons and human-interest stories help support both SEL & ELA development.
Learn MoreCreated with Sketch.
Administrators
Empower educators, engage students and connect parents, while collecting insights and real-time reports on your SEL initiative.
Learn MoreCreated with Sketch.
![mockup pk-12](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/mockup-k-8-CHSdEUyk.png)
### BUILDING WELL-BEING SKILLS
# Resilient Students Lead to Healthier Schools

Created with Sketch.Request a Quote
![classroom interaction](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/new-mockup-k-5-D9uGW7zD.png)
### PRE-K TO 5TH GRADE
Helping Kids Understand & Manage Emotions
Our easy-to-use, educator-led curriculum features levelled readers and fully-planned lessons to help students develop empathy, self-regulation and more while also developing core academic skills, including reading, writing, listening, speaking, representing and problem-solving.
In myPeekaville, Peekapak's elementary digital learning game, students experience SEL concepts in the context of an interactive story-world, filled with quests, games, embedded with extrinsic rewards to motivate learning.
Created with Sketch.Review Elementary Resources
![Download from App Store](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/badge-CVyK0T4N.svg)![Download from Google Play Store](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/badge-DMfNOuEY.png)
![peekaville map](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/home-left-right-2-Cg5ZMxmh.png)
### 6TH TO 12TH GRADE
Supporting Teen Well-Being and Resilience
Adolescence comes with heightened challenges—stress, anxiety, social pressures, and academic demands. Peekapak’s research-backed program helps middle and high school students build resilience, manage emotions, and develop the confidence they need to navigate school and life.
Created with Sketch.Review Secondary Resources
![classroom interaction](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/mockup-data-D87LN2by.png)
### FOR CLASSROOMS, SCHOOL AND DISTRICTS
Real-Time Insights
Understand your students‘ emotions and skill comprehension to foster a supportive learning environment.
  * Track Student Emotions with Daily Feelings Check-Ins
  * Monitor Student Skill Comprehension
  * Identify Trends in Student Feelings & Emotional Well-Being
  * Easily Share Reports with Administrators


# Award Winning Learning
Peekapak helps students learn, practice, and internalize CASEL’s five social-emotional learning competencies through our award-winning stories, lessons, and digital games.
![smart media award](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/logo-award-smart-media-straight-BPFPq1gA.png)![digital promise product](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/logo-certification-digital-promise-product-n5qn-srw.png)![top EdTech products](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/logo-award-top-EdTech-CBFNe93c.png)![common sense education award](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/logo-award-common-sense-education-CDq9OvpW.png)![family choice award](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/logo-award-family-choice-D7AQUoSf.png)
# Integration Partners for Success
Peekapak integrates with the following providers for single sign on and seamless rostering capabilities.
![/assets/logo-classlink-BXXTF_lN.png](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/logo-classlink-BXXTF_lN.png)![/assets/logo-clever-text-C7qiq3G0.png](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/logo-clever-text-C7qiq3G0.png)![/assets/logo-google-classroom-BhLMqIur.png](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/logo-google-classroom-BhLMqIur.png)
# Build a Holistic SEL Plan
Our team can help your school build a holistic SEL plan with engaging curriculum, professional development, print and family engagement resources. 
## Engage Families With Virtual Well Being Nights
[Learn more](http://www.peekapak.com/</familyWellBeing>)
## Professional Development for Educators, on the CASEL Competencies
[Learn more](http://www.peekapak.com/</professionalDevelopment>)
## Print Resources to Support Literacy and Your School Culture
[Learn more](http://www.peekapak.com/<https:/shop.peekapak.com>)
  * # － Aligned to CASEL standards
Peekapak’s curriculum is aligned to CASEL’s framework of five social emotional learning competencies. Students learn these important skills through fun stories and games, then revisit them often so they become truly internalized.
![CASEL areas](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/wheel-Bb01E2nk.png)
  * # ＋ Safe and Effective in Schools
Peekapak’s lessons are developed using evidence-based practices and have been researched in districts, Pre-K and after-school programs. We value student privacy and are iKeepSafe Certified (COPPA compliant).
![coppa seal](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/coppa-CT5RNEfB.png)
  * # ＋ Engages Students
Peekapak gives students agency to explore a personalized learning experience where they can practice lessons learned in class.
![Thumbnail](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/video-BiTqePOX.png)![Video](data:image/svg+xml,%3c?xml%20version='1.0'%20encoding='UTF-8'%20standalone='no'?%3e%3csvg%20viewBox='0%200%20141%20141'%20version='1.1'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink'%3e%3c!--%20Generator:%20sketchtool%2039.1%20\(31721\)%20-%20http://www.bohemiancoding.com/sketch%20--%3e%3ctitle%3e8F002803-7124-4FF5-8574-B181BAB024D7%3c/title%3e%3cdesc%3eCreated%20with%20sketchtool.%3c/desc%3e%3cdefs%3e%3cfilter%20x='-50%25'%20y='-50%25'%20width='200%25'%20height='200%25'%20filterUnits='objectBoundingBox'%20id='filter-1'%3e%3cfeOffset%20dx='0'%20dy='2'%20in='SourceAlpha'%20result='shadowOffsetOuter1'%3e%3c/feOffset%3e%3cfeGaussianBlur%20stdDeviation='4'%20in='shadowOffsetOuter1'%20result='shadowBlurOuter1'%3e%3c/feGaussianBlur%3e%3cfeComposite%20in='shadowBlurOuter1'%20in2='SourceAlpha'%20operator='out'%20result='shadowBlurOuter1'%3e%3c/feComposite%3e%3cfeColorMatrix%20values='0%200%200%200%200.168169785%200%200%200%200%200.433758078%200%200%200%200%200.661405187%200%200%200%200.4%200'%20type='matrix'%20in='shadowBlurOuter1'%20result='shadowMatrixOuter1'%3e%3c/feColorMatrix%3e%3cfeMerge%3e%3cfeMergeNode%20in='shadowMatrixOuter1'%3e%3c/feMergeNode%3e%3cfeMergeNode%20in='SourceGraphic'%3e%3c/feMergeNode%3e%3c/feMerge%3e%3c/filter%3e%3ccircle%20id='path-2'%20cx='60.5'%20cy='60.5'%20r='60.5'%3e%3c/circle%3e%3cfilter%20x='-50%25'%20y='-50%25'%20width='200%25'%20height='200%25'%20filterUnits='objectBoundingBox'%20id='filter-3'%3e%3cfeOffset%20dx='0'%20dy='2'%20in='SourceAlpha'%20result='shadowOffsetOuter1'%3e%3c/feOffset%3e%3cfeGaussianBlur%20stdDeviation='2'%20in='shadowOffsetOuter1'%20result='shadowBlurOuter1'%3e%3c/feGaussianBlur%3e%3cfeComposite%20in='shadowBlurOuter1'%20in2='SourceAlpha'%20operator='out'%20result='shadowBlurOuter1'%3e%3c/feComposite%3e%3cfeColorMatrix%20values='0%200%200%200%200.882352941%200%200%200%200%200.909803922%200%200%200%200%200.93333333   * # ＋ Accessible and Easily Modified
Use all Peekapak units and resources for ongoing classroom support or select the pieces that fit within your existing curriculum. Our levelled readers and variety of lessons provide you flexibility to meet the needs of all your students.
![snapshot of library view](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/mockup-k-8-CHSdEUyk.png)
  * # ＋ Promotes Diversity and Inclusion
With Peekapak, educators, parents, and students all play a role in the learning process by celebrating the diversity in each other’s backgrounds, talents and interests.
![group play](http://www.peekapak.com/assets/diversity-LeDqwPrW.png)

# Expert-backed Design Principles
Peekapak’s original stories and lessons were carefully designed with help from experts to support educators and parents in teaching SEL and literacy skills. Every detail is carefully crafted so students relate to, engage with, and learn from our content.

### Do you agree to the use of cookies?
We use cookies to store your preferences and other information to customize your experience on our website, such as a cookie to remember your location in order to provide you with content and materials that are specific to where you are located.
For subscribers, we also use cookies to collect usage analytics in order to provide school- and district-oriented reports to educators and administrators. We do not serve ads, so we do not use cookies to track your activity for targeted advertising.
By clicking “I agree” you consent to the use of all cookies.

Helping Students Thrive with Engaging Learning & Well-Being Insights
A research-backed platform blending immersive storytelling, interactive activities, and real-time data to support mental health, social-emotional growth, and academic success—all while aligning with educational standards.
Elementary (PreK-Gr. 5)
Features levelled readers and fully-planned learning activities to help students develop SEL while also building reading and writing skills.

Secondary (Gr. 6-12)

### PRE-K TO 5TH GRADE
Helping Kids Understand & Manage Emotions
Our easy-to-use, educator-led curriculum features levelled readers and fully-planned lessons to help students develop empathy, self-regulation and more while also developing core academic skills, including reading, writing, listening, speaking, representing and problem-solving.
In myPeekaville, Peekapak's elementary digital learning game, students experience SEL concepts in the context of an interactive story-world, filled with quests, games, embedded with extrinsic rewards to motivate learning.
Created with Sketch.Review Elementary Resources
![Download from App Store⟨13⟩]![Download from Google Play Store⟨14⟩]
![peekaville map⟨15⟩]
### 6TH TO 12TH GRADE
Supporting Teen Well-Being and Resilience
Adolescence comes with heightened challenges—stress, anxiety, social pressures, and academic demands. Peekapak’s research-backed program helps middle and high school students build resilience, manage emotions, and develop the confidence they need to navigate school and life.
Created with Sketch.Review Secondary Resources
![classroom interaction⟨16⟩]
### FOR CLASSROOMS, SCHOOL AND DISTRICTS
Real-Time Insights
Understand your students‘ emotions and skill comprehension to foster a supportive learning environment.
  * Track Student Emotions with Daily Feelings Check-Ins
  * Monitor Student Skill Comprehension
  * Identify Trends in Student Feelings & Emotional Well-Being
  * Easily Share Reports with Administrators


# Award Winning Learning
Peekapak helps students learn, practice, and internalize CASEL’s five social-emotional learning competencies through our award-winning stories, lessons, and digital games.
![smart media award⟨17⟩]![digital promise product⟨18⟩]![top EdTech products⟨19⟩]![common sense education award⟨20⟩]![family choice award⟨21⟩]

## Print Resources to Support Literacy and Your School Culture
Learn more⟨27⟩
  * # － Aligned to CASEL standards
Peekapak’s curriculum is aligned to CASEL’s framework of five social emotional learning competencies. Students learn these important skills through fun stories and games, then revisit them often so they become truly internalized.
![CASEL areas⟨28⟩]
  * # ＋ Safe and Effective in Schools
Peekapak’s lessons are developed using evidence-based practices and have been researched in districts, Pre-K and after-school programs. We value student privacy and are iKeepSafe Certified (COPPA compliant).
![coppa seal⟨29⟩]
  * # ＋ Engages Students
Peekapak gives students agency to explore a personalized learning experience where they can practice lessons learned in class.

### PEEKAPAK RESEARCH
# Expert-backed Design Principles
Peekapak’s original stories and lessons were carefully designed with help from experts to support educators and parents in teaching SEL and literacy skills. Every detail is carefully crafted so students relate to, engage with, and learn from our content.

### Do you agree to the use of cookies?
We use cookies to store your preferences and other information to customize your experience on our website, such as a cookie to remember your location in order to provide you with content and materials that are specific to where you are located.
For subscribers, we also use cookies to collect usage analytics in order to provide school- and district-oriented reports to educators and administrators. We do not serve ads, so we do not use cookies to track your activity for targeted advertising.
By clicking “I agree” you consent to the use of all cookies.

generated_description:
**Peekapak: Empowering Social and Emotional Learning**

Welcome to Peekapak—a Toronto-based company that’s changing the game in education through social and emotional learning (SEL). While they’ve got a wealth of awards and recognition under their belt, the heart of their mission is simple: equip students—both at home and in the classroom—with the tools they need to thrive emotionally and academically.

Peekapak is an engaging and research-backed curriculum designed specifically for PreK through Grade 12, blending essential SEL skills such as empathy and self-regulation with Common Core standards for reading and writing. The unique spin? They make their resources easily accessible through a freemium website where teachers can sign up for free at [Peekapak.com](http://www.peekapak.com).

### Highlights of Peekapak:
- **Innovative Approach**: Their program combines immersive storytelling and interactive experiences, making learning fun and relatable.
- **Diverse Partnerships**: Collaborations with various educational institutions like Denver Public Schools and George Brown College ensure that their offerings are grounded in research and real-world applicability.
- **Recognition and Awards**: Peekapak is celebrated by numerous media outlets, from Entrepreneur Magazine to CBC, and has received accolades such as the Academics' Choice Award and the MasterCard Women in Entrepreneurship program.
- **Growth Support**: Backed by Imagine K12 (part of Y Combinator) and other accelerator programs, they are empowered to grow and innovate continually.

### How It Works:
- **For Younger Students (PreK–5)**: The curriculum features leveled readers and carefully crafted lessons to nurture emotional intelligence while honing reading and writing skills. Their platform also includes **myPeekaville**, a digital learning game that immerses kids in SEL concepts via interactive narrative challenges.
  
- **For Teens (6–12)**: The program aims to build resilience and manage stress, arming students with the confidence to navigate the complexities of adolescence and school life.

- **Real-Time Insights for Educators**: Teachers benefit from tools to monitor student emotions and comprehension, fostering a supportive classroom environment. This data-driven approach allows educators to tweak their strategies effectively.

### Getting Onboard:
Leveraging their impressive track record in creating engaging, effective SEL programming, Peekapak strives to build holistic SEL plans tailored to schools. They offer professional development and family engagement resources, ensuring that the entire community is involved in cultivating emotional well-being.

In a world where education goes beyond academics, Peekapak stands out as a beacon of hope and practical solutions. You can find more details and sign up for their resources at their website, [Peekapak.com](http://www.peekapak.com).
